content: a delicate vintage-style lace bookmark pattern it can easily be adjusted to be longer or shorter based on your preferences ***this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience *** **difficulty ** intermediate **materials needed ** 15-20 yards #30 extra fine aunt lydia s crochet thread in natural or color of your choice 1 15mm steel hook fine embroidery needle stitch markers starching spray of your choice blocking board **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet **additional terms ** puff abbreviated puff in pattern yo pull up a loop 3 times in same st yo pull through 6 loops yo pull through final 2 loops v_stitch double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in same st picot = chain 3 slip_stitch back into first chain st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces skip = skip prev = previous **gauge ** 18 single_crochet in 1 5 each row 2-5 repeat adds approximately 3/4 of height **measurements ** 1 3/4 wide by 6 or 7 tall after blocking **additional notes ** -chain 1 at beginning of row does not count as stitch -turning chains counted as first st of next row will be included in the next row s stitch count
